short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to clear your downloads with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With the updated google chrome browser, you now have to go through a few clicks to clear your downloads. This can be annoying for an impatient person like me. This simple chrome plugin allows you to clear your downloads with one click :)
